input:
On the table, you see several things arranged in a row: a black pencil, a turquoise paperclip, and a yellow stress ball. What is the color of the thing directly to the left of the paperclip?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
